mapper.update: update coupon_config set stock = stock + #{num}, receive_num = receive_num - #{num} where id = #{id} and stock + #{num} >= 0 and deleted = false and state = true
mapper.select: select id, title, max_limit, coupon_type, deduction_value, discount_value, use_threshold, use_start_time, use_end_time, instruction from coupon_config where deleted = false and stock > 0 and state = 1 and `mode` = 1 and now() between start_time and end_time

select r.id, r.title, r.max_limit, r.coupon_type, r.deduction_value, r.discount_value, r.use_threshold, r.use_start_time, r.use_end_time, r.instruction from coupon_config r left join coupon_item t on t.coupon_config_id = r.id where r.deleted = false and r.stock > 0 and r.state = 1 and r.`mode` = 1
and ((t.product_id = #{productId} and r.use_scope = 2) or (r.use_scope = 1 and r.store_id = #{storeId}))
